com.topcoder.management.review
Interface ReviewManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultReviewManager
public interface ReviewManager

This ReviewManager interface defines the contract of managing the review entities. It provides the management functionalities to create, update and search review entities. It can also be used to add comment for review and item, and get all the comment types from the manager.

Thread safety: Implementation of this class is not required to be thread-safe.

Version:
1.0
Author:
woodjhon, icyriver

Method Detail

createReview

public void createReview(com.topcoder.management.review.data.Review review,
                         java.lang.String operator)
                  throws ReviewManagementException

This method creates the review entity in the manager. This method will also create the associated Comment and Item instances.

Parameters:
review - the review entity to be created in the manager.
operator - the operator who creates the review entity.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null, or operator is empty string, or review fails to pass the validation.
ReviewManagementException - if failed to create the review entity in the manager.

updateReview

public void updateReview(com.topcoder.management.review.data.Review review,
                         java.lang.String operator)
                  throws ReviewManagementException

This method updates the review entity in the manager. This method will also be responsible for creating, deleting, updating the associated Item instances.

Parameters:
review - the review entity to update into the manager.
operator - the operator who updates the review entity.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if arguments is null, or operator is empty string, or review fails to pass the validation.
ReviewManagementException - if failed to update the review entity in the manager.

getReview

public com.topcoder.management.review.data.Review getReview(long id)
                                                     throws ReviewManagementException

This method gets the review entity from the manager with given review entity id.

Parameters:
id - the id of the review entity to be retrieved.
Returns:
the retrieved review entity with its id.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given id is not positive.
ReviewManagementException - if failed to get the review entity from the manager.

searchReviews

public com.topcoder.management.review.data.Review[] searchReviews(com.topcoder.search.builder.filter.Filter filter,
                                                                  boolean complete)
                                                           throws ReviewManagementException

This method will search the review entities with the given search filters. If the complete argument is false, the associated items and comments of the matching review entity will not been retrieved.

Five fields supported by the searchReviews method in version 1.0:

  • scorecardType - the score card type, must be Long type.
  • submission - the review submission id, must be Long type.
  • reviewer - the author of the review, must be Long type.
  • project - the project id of the review, must be Long type.
  • committed --- indicate if the review has been committed, using Integer(1) representing committed, or Integer(0) representing not committed.

Parameters:
filter - the filter that specifies the search conditions.
complete - a boolean variable indicating if the complete review data is retrieved.
Returns:
the array of matching review entities, or empty array if no review entity matches the filter.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the filter is null.
ReviewManagementException - if failed to search the review entities from the manager.

addReviewComment

public void addReviewComment(long reviewId,
                             com.topcoder.management.review.data.Comment comment,
                             java.lang.String operator)
                      throws ReviewManagementException

This method will add comment to review with given review id. This method is also responsible for creating the Comment instance.

Parameters:
reviewId - the id of review entity.
comment - the Comment instance to be added.
operator - the operator who adds the comment.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null, or reviewId is not positive, or operator is empty string.
ReviewManagementException - if failed to add comment for the review entity in the manager.

                           com.topcoder.management.review.data.Comment comment,
                           java.lang.String operator)
                    throws ReviewManagementException

This method will add the comment to the item with given item id. This method is also responsible for creating the Comment instance.

Parameters:
itemId - the item id.
comment - the Comment instance to be added.
operator - the operator who adds the comment.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null, or itemId is not positive, or operator is empty string.
ReviewManagementException - if failed to add comment for the item entity in the manager.

getAllCommentTypes

public com.topcoder.management.review.data.CommentType[] getAllCommentTypes()
                                                                     throws ReviewManagementException

This method will get all the CommentType instance from the manager.

Returns:
the array of all CommentType instances from the persistence, or empty array if no comment type can be found.
Throws:
ReviewManagementException - if failed to get all comment types from manager.
